name: Starry Night of the Past: Colors of Heart

skills.name: Primary Color Spurt
skills.description:
[SP: 0][CD: 20] Deploys the cross [summoned entity]: When the cross is deployed, deals 600.0% ATK of Physical DMG to surrounding enemies, inflicts 10.0 Bleed Trauma and splash paintto deal 60.0% ATK of Physical DMG within the range every 1.5s for 18s.

skills.name: Colors Engraved into Heart
skills.description: Increases Total DMG of the host's Combo ATK and Ult by 35.0% and Physical DMG of all team members by 20.0%(Can not be stacked).

skills.name: Shading and Colorfulness
skills.description:
Increases Bleed DMG by 20.0%.
After using the active skill, enemies with a broken shield or no shield take 8.0% more DMG for 22s(Can be refreshed) and gains the following effect once: When an attack hits a Bleeding enemy, splash paint to deal 5 x 140.0% ATK of Physical DMG to surrounding enemies.
